attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please help us to split the country, people are dying. South Yemen is over rules by Northern people, taken the lands of South, forcing the people to come for vote or otherwise salary will be deducted. Send people from here without Presidents knowledge and see how people are suffering in South Yemen. They make people by force praise them infront of media and world otherwise their Family will be put into trouble or killed.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
